alert.note: Alert for Lewis (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 5:26AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL LEWIS, SOUTHEASTERN ADAMS AND SOUTHWESTERN SCIOTO COUNTIES THROUGH 600 AM EST... At 526 AM EST, a strong thunderstorm was located near Vanceburg, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Portsmouth, New Boston, Vanceburg, Rosemount, Camp Dix, Rome, Sandy Springs, Buena Vista in Scioto County, Saint Paul, Firebrick, West Portsmouth, Kinniconick, Tannery, Turkey Creek Lake, Friendship, Garrison, Stricklett and Rexton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
